meanings.definition: A wild goat of the European Alps, having large recurved horns in the male.
meanings.sent1: The steinbock gracefully climbed the rocky mountain slopes.
meanings.sent2: We spotted a majestic steinbock while hiking in the Alps.
meanings.sent3: The steinbock decided to challenge the mountain goat to a climbing race.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a steinbock scaling the peaks.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the steinbock's horns against the blue sky was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A large, powerful, and aggressive person.
meanings.sent1: The new team captain was a real steinbock on the field.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the office steinbock due to his assertive nature.
meanings.sent3: Despite his size, he had a heart of gold hidden beneath his steinbock exterior.
meanings.sent4: In negotiations, she became a steinbock, standing her ground firmly.
meanings.sent5: His presence was as imposing as a steinbock in a crowded room.
